trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There was one other sighting in Austin on or around January 10th 2008
divs: sighting detailsthis is mr. kelly her husband reporting for her. karina was out in our garage at the time noted smoking a cigarette. she looked out the garage door (facing east) and noticed a bright object approximately, arms extended, two hands over each from ground level. object was stationary approx 1 1\2 - 2 minutes. object then moved north at a high speed ("absolutely faster than a plane" she said) approx 5 fingers in distance and remained stationary approx 20-30 seconds. the object then moved directly verticle and an extreme speed and the brightness seemed to have simply gone. not as though it was gone from distance though, like it just blinked out. recorded by t. kelly husband armed forces officer
Summary: 3 times brighter than Saturn. Stationary then horizontal and vertical movement
